events.name: Responsible Mineral Sourcing Initiatives
events.wd_description: This event discusses the global efforts and approaches taken in responsible mineral sourcing, focusing on conflict minerals and materials needed for renewable energy technologies.
events.description: This event discusses the global efforts and approaches taken in responsible mineral sourcing, focusing on conflict minerals and materials needed for renewable energy technologies.

events.name: Conflict minerals initiatives
events.wd_description: Focuses on efforts to address the ethical concerns surrounding conflict minerals such as tin, tungsten, tantalum, and gold.
events.description: Focuses on efforts to address the ethical concerns surrounding conflict minerals such as tin, tungsten, tantalum, and gold.

events.name: Renewable energy minerals initiatives
events.wd_description: Discusses initiatives for sourcing metals and minerals like cobalt, graphite, lithium, manganese, and nickel required for renewable energy technologies.
events.description: Discusses initiatives for sourcing metals and minerals like cobalt, graphite, lithium, manganese, and nickel required for renewable energy technologies.

events.name: Evolution of initiatives
events.wd_description: Describes the development and changes in responsible mineral sourcing initiatives over the past two decades.
events.description: Describes the development and changes in responsible mineral sourcing initiatives over the past two decades.

events.name: Approaches and impacts
events.wd_description: Contrasts mandatory and voluntary approaches in responsible mineral sourcing and summarizes their impacts on local communities and corporate actors.
events.description: Contrasts mandatory and voluntary approaches in responsible mineral sourcing and summarizes their impacts on local communities and corporate actors.

events.name: Challenges and opportunities
events.wd_description: Discusses the challenges and opportunities presented by new technologies and traceability systems in responsible mineral sourcing.
events.description: Discusses the challenges and opportunities presented by new technologies and traceability systems in responsible mineral sourcing.
